body.p: The PDU is housed in single NEMA-1 rated main cabinet enclosure. An optional side car is attached to the main cabinet to house the input breaker if the PDU is greater than 750 kVA. Enclosure depth varies as required by specific transformer specifications, such as K-factor, temperature rise, inrush, impedance, or aluminum construction.

Enclosure dimensions are as follows:
400 kVA: 60" W x 40" D x 84" H, if the PDU has the standard transformer.
500 kVA: 60” W x 42” D x 84” H, if the PDU has the standard transformer.
625 – 750 kVA: 60” W x 48-56" D x 84” H", cabinet depth varies by transformer requirements.
1000 –1125 kVA PDU: 86"W x 56"D x 84"H, includes a side car required for the main input circuit breaker.
